comments.body:
Rather than removing this field you should include a copy of the licence file in the recipe directory instead
```suggestion
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@  home: https://pixstem.org
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Library for processing scanning transmission electron microscopy data acquired using a pixelated detector'
